body:
Sorry for not posting yesterday; it slipped my mind. Anyways, back again with another spotlight. If you want one of your own, fill out the application format here: https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2. Today's spotlightee is alexanderjoe!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My username is alexandjoe and my favorite game on Avicus is Nebula.

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
Hello, I'm Alexander, most people know me for the popular Avicus build server I host. Into my life, I'm in school soccer which is something I really enjoy. I also have fun learning to code and talk with people on teamspeak.

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
I'm probably most obsessed over CS:GO right now. Just because getting back into a FPS game is a lot of fun.

What interests you the most in life?
Something in life that really interests me is aerial photography, which is something a lot of people are into.

​What music/art/media do you like?
Most of my music choices come from Spotify's Discovery playlist.

​Where are you from?
I'm from a small town in Pennsylvania USA.

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
Trying to get better at PvP, which I currently am not very good at, or talking on teamspeak.

​Anything else you want to mention?
Nada.

title: Community Spotlight #12 - alexanderjoe
